title: SLATE OF QUESTIONS
introduction: Your participation in The Merit Report offers you the opportunity to express your opinion on today's news issues and events. Each week the results of The Merit Report, just like the media across the nation. This week, we have selected inflation as issues in the news, Academy Award films and movie ratings, and the continuing hostage crisis in Iran.

questions.question: Have you ever been asked questions about current events or issues in a public opinion poll before?
Which one statement below best describes your personal feelings about the cost of living?
options: I AM NOT CONCERNED AT ALL.
I AM UNDECIDED ABOUT HOW I FEEL.

questions.question: How do you think the cost of living will change in the next six months?
options: THE COST OF LIVING WILL INCREASE
THE COST OF LIVING WILL DECREASE
THE COST OF LIVING WILL REMAIN THE SAME

questions.question: How many movies have you seen in the past year?
options: I HAVE NOT SEEN ANY MOVIES IN THE PAST YEAR
